Title: Firefox Embedded Browser
Description: A control to embed Firefox's Web-Browser in a program. It requires Firefox be installed but other then that, its all self contained!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A control to embed Firefox's Web-Browser in a program. It requires Firefox be installed but other then that, its all self contained!

About

This is a simple control aimed at making life easier when you need a web browser program and you don't want to use Microsoft's shitty Web-browser control. Everyone who isn't a dumbass loves Firefox and now you can make everyone happy by using Firefox!

Notes

  • Based off Skybound's Gecko FX
